Title: Episode 7
Plot: Lee Kaa saves Meredith from her dream, and Cardwell wins over Rufus. Kate and Nick decide to make a big bang, and Meredith learns the truth about the island and Lee Kaa.
GuestStars: Charles Koroncho as Kaitangata, Mitchell Potts as Young Lee Kaa, Gary Mackay as Shelley's Father, Karen Mackay as Sheley's Mother, Robert Faith as Foreman, Jason Te Mete as Rufus' Teacher
